name: Dark Pink Visited Links for some sites
description: For some websites that don't distinguish visited links from normal links.
additional_info: I'm lazy so that's a dirty hack (I mean _really_, it's only a:visited {color: violet !important} if you know what I mean) but it does the job for me. Adding/removing sites or changing colour is kinda easy. I use #822D7F.
